subject: Order
description_text:
Hello i recently made an order for a set on haptics but u realized I only
bought 2 instead of 3, I would like to add the third one for my clutch. Can
you please help me do this?

conversations.body_text: Hi Carlos Adame,    We apologize for the delayed response. Your order has just been shipped following the weekend, and we are unable to make any changes at this time. You may purchase a Vam Pro haptics separately.    https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor
